Pre-Game Insights: Iceland will be aiming to start their 2024-25 UEFA Nations League campaign with a victory
Iceland finished second in Group 2 of League B last time out
Montenegro finished third in Group 3 of the same division in their last Nations League campaign
Iceland failed to qualify for Euro 2024, losing 2-1 to Ukraine in their playoff final
Iceland have only competed in the finals of two major tournaments - one World Cup and one European Championship
Age Hareide's side were last in action on June 10, suffering a 4-0 defeat to the Netherlands in a friendly
Iceland beat England 1-0 in a non-competitive fixture at the start of June
Iceland finished second in Group 2 of League B in their last Nations League campaign, drawing all four of their matches against Israel and Albania
Montenegro finished third in their qualification section for Euro 2024
Montenegro have never qualified for a World Cup
Montenegro were beaten twice by Belgium and Georgia in friendlies at the start of June
Montenegro won their opening two fixtures of the year against Belarus and North Macedonia
Montenegro gained promotion from League C of the Nations League due to their performance in the 2020-21 competition
Montenegro finished third in Group 3 of League B in 2022-23
Montenegro lost their last two matches in this competition against Bosnia-Herzegovina and Finland
